column4: Hi, I'm having trouble with ubuntu-server, after I reboot the memory usage steadly goes up and up but when I look at the list of processes nothing seems to be consuming large amounts of memory, can anyone suggest how I might diagnose this problem?
how do you know the memory use is going up
the memory in use as reported by top and free increases close to my max memory but after that no swap is used.
that could be a good thing depending on how the kernel is managing memory
